alert.note: Alert for Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ingham County through 715 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Eaton Rapids, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lansing... Mason... East Lansing... Williamston... Leslie... Stockbridge... Edgemont Park... Aurelius... Onondaga... Bunker Hill... Webberville... Dansville... Eden... Fitchburg... Okemos... Bell Oak... Holt... Haslett... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
